channel.title: Extended Weekend Radio Show
channel.description:
Matt Oakey's unique take on the world of House music.
Every week he pulls together an hour of the freshest new tunes from around the world.
channel.itunes:subtitle: This Is House Music...!
channel.itunes:author: Matt Oakey

item.title: The Final Extended Weekend Radio Show Podcast - October 2nd 2010
item.description: After 3 years of radio broadcast and podcast the Extended Weekend has come to an end as Matt takes a break from his Decks for the foreseeable future. Please enjoy this final Radio Show podcast. 1. Micha Moor – Learn To Fly 2. Matt Oakey – Little Noise (Nev Scott Remix) 3. Alex Sayz Ft Sibel – United As One 4. Junitoshi – Shining Star (Matt Oakey Remix) 5. Keith Thompson & Marcia Ilieva - Truly (Central Ave Remix) 6. Junitoshi – Underworld (Matt Oakey Remix) 7. John Shelvin - Always 8. Matt Oakey – What? 9. Sunloverz Ft Jamie Sparks - I Wanna Fly 10. Bailey - Shimmer 11. The Mitchell Project – Welcome To The Dance (Matt Oakey Vocal Remix) 12. Moguai – Oyster (Michael Woods Remix) visit www.mattoakey.co.uk http://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=1143302179&ref=name www.myspace.com/mattoakeydj
